snippet: BEIL--Sheldon. It is now 8 years that you are gone. Your family and friends speak of you often and mention your pickled herring. I miss your hugs, smiles, jokes and hearing "Did I tell you today that I love you." You are in my thoughts every day. Your Loving Wife, Ruthie 1/3
lead_paragraph: BEIL--Sheldon. It is now 8 years that you are gone. Your family and friends speak of you often and mention your pickled herring. I miss your hugs, smiles, jokes and hearing "Did I tell you today that I love you." You are in my thoughts every day. Your Loving Wife, Ruthie 1/3
